intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: DeFarm ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our agricultural traceability platform and related services.

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as name, email address, company/farm name, and animal identification data. We also automatically collect usage data, device information, IP address, and cookies to improve our services.

usage.title: How We Use Your Data
usage.content: We use your data to provide and maintain our traceability services, process transactions, send communications about your account, improve our platform, comply with legal obligations, and generate compliance reports (such as EUDR). We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We may share your data with supply chain participants within your circuits (with your consent), technology partners who assist in operating our platform, regulatory authorities when legally required, and financial partners for CPR issuance and credit analysis. All partners are bound by confidentiality agreements.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure servers, and blockchain-based immutable records. While no system is 100% secure, we continuously work to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD) and other applicable regulations, you have the right to access, correct, delete, or port your personal data. You may also revoke consent at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us at contact@defarm.net.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at contact@defarm.net or at our address: Av. Afonso Pena, 4785, Sala 701, Santa Fé, 79.031-010 Campo Grande, Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using DeFarm's platform and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree, you should not use our services. These terms apply to all users, including producers, processors, retailers, and developers.

services.title: Services Description
services.content: DeFarm provides an agricultural traceability platform that includes animal tracking and registration, EUDR compliance reporting, asset tokenization, digital CPR issuance, and APIs for system integration. Services may be updated or modified at any time with prior notice.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account. You must provide accurate and complete information during registration. DeFarm reserves the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content, software, algorithms, and technology on the DeFarm platform are protected by intellectual property laws. You are granted a limited, non-exclusive license to use our services. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or reverse-engineer any part of our platform without written consent.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: DeFarm provides services "as is" and makes no warranties regarding accuracy or completeness of traceability data entered by users. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our total liability is limited to the amount paid for services in the 12 months preceding the claim.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate the agreement at any time with 30 days' written notice. DeFarm may immediately terminate access in case of terms violation. Upon termination, you may request export of your data within 90 days.

law.title: Governing Law
law.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil. Any disputes shall be submitted to the courts of Campo Grande, Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Use, contact us at contact@defarm.net or at our address: Av. Afonso Pena, 4785, Sala 701, Santa Fé, 79.031-010 Campo Grande, Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil.

solutions.title: Our
solutions.subtitle: Cutting-edge technology for complete agricultural traceability

0.title: Cattle Traceability
0.description: Complete individual animal tracking system. From birth to slaughter, every stage is recorded securely and immutably on the blockchain.

1.title: EUDR Compliance
1.description: Meet EU Deforestation Regulation requirements automatically. Reports and documentation ready for export.

2.title: Tokenization
2.description: Transform your agricultural assets into digital tokens. Access new markets and financing opportunities through blockchain technology.

3.title: QR Code Verification
3.description: Allow end consumers to verify the full origin of the product with a simple QR Code scan at the point of sale.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Transforming Brazilian agriculture with technology and transparency
about.story1: DeFarm was born from the need to bring more transparency and trust to Brazil's agricultural supply chain. Founded in 2025 by blockchain technology and agribusiness experts, our mission is to connect every link in the chain with verifiable and immutable data.
about.story2: We believe traceability is not just a regulatory requirement, but an opportunity to value Brazilian production in the global market. With DeFarm, producers can prove the quality and origin of their products, processors ensure full compliance, and consumers have access to the complete story of what they consume.

0.title: Mission
0.description: Revolutionize Brazilian agricultural traceability, ensuring transparency and trust across the entire supply chain.

1.title: Purpose
1.description: Connect producers, industry and consumers through accessible technology and reliable data.

2.title: Integrity
2.description: Immutable and verifiable data. Our blockchain platform ensures every piece of information is truthful.

3.title: Collaboration
3.description: We work side by side with all chain participants to create solutions that work in practice.
